Reviews.subtitle: See what our clients say about us.

items.text: The craftsmanship is incredible. It's not just a mailbox, it's a piece of art. The Corten steel looks amazing against our modern fence.
Arrived faster than expected. The personalization is precise and sharp. Highly recommend for anyone looking to upgrade their curb appeal.
Heavy duty and beautiful. The brass finish is stunning and draws compliments from all our neighbors. Worth every penny.

FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our products.

shipping.question: Do you ship internationally?
shipping.answer: Yes, we ship our mailboxes worldwide including the US, Canada, Europe, and Australia. Every package is securely crated to ensure safe arrival.

production.question: How long does custom production take?
production.answer: Since every item is hand-finished, standard orders ship within 2-3 business days. Personalized orders typically take 5-7 business days to craft with precision.

corten.question: Will the Corten steel stain my wall?
corten.answer: Our Corten steel is pre-weathered but natural stabilization takes time. We recommend using the provided stand-off spacers to create a gap between the mailbox and the wall, preventing direct contact runoff.

customization.question: Can I choose a different font for numbers?
customization.answer: Absolutely. We offer customization options for fonts and sizes. Please specify your preference in the order notes or contact our support team for a mockup.

brand.question: Who is Ferrum Decor Studio?
brand.answer: Ferrum Decor Studio is a Ukrainian brand of designer metal products. We create corten steel mailboxes, decorative vents, and custom metalworks that make your home exterior stylish and durable.

history.question: What is your story?
history.answer: After 2022, we reimagined our production, opening doors to international clients. Today, our products are shipped to the USA, Canada, and Europe, and every order is a result of passion, craftsmanship, and attention to detail.

FAQ.main_shop_note: Visit our main shop for purchases:

Footer.slogan: Forging the future of curb appeal. Handcrafted excellence in every weld.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.geo_value: We ship orders throughout Ukraine and internationally.
Contact.delivery_value: International delivery is available for most countries.

About.intro: Ferrum Decor Studio is a Ukrainian workshop of designer metal products for exterior and interior.
About.specialization: The brand specializes in creating modern mailboxes, ventilation grilles, hatches and decorative metal elements that combine functionality, durability and architectural aesthetics.
About.philosophy_text: We create products that become part of the home design and form the first impression of the space.

products_list.vents: Ventilation grilles made of steel, stainless steel and brass

About.approach_text: Ferrum Decor Studio products are developed taking into account modern architectural trends and are suitable for both private houses and commercial objects.
About.quality_text: All products are created with attention to detail and undergo quality control before being sent to the client.
About.global_text: We work with customers all over the world and offer international delivery.

materials.title: Premium Materials
materials.description: We use high-quality metals, including corten steel, brass, and a combination of metal with natural wood. These materials are characterized by high strength, resistance to weather conditions, and durability.

personalization.title: Full Personalization
personalization.description: Each mailbox is created with the client's wishes in mind. You can add a name, address, logo, individual design, or even your own image so that the product perfectly complements the exterior of your home or business.

design.title: Unique Design
design.description: We create modern, vintage, and artistic solutions that turn a mailbox into an element of architecture and decor. Each product combines aesthetics and functionality.

security.title: Reliability and Security
security.description: Our mailboxes are equipped with convenient mounting systems and locks that protect correspondence and ensure comfortable use.

craftsmanship.title: Handmade and Attention to Detail
craftsmanship.description: Each product is made with high precision and undergoes individual processing, which ensures the quality and exclusivity of the products.

speed.title: Fast Manufacturing
speed.description: The average production time is 5–8 working days, which allows for fast realization of individual orders.

shipping.title: Worldwide Shipping
shipping.description: We successfully send products to customers all over the world, ensuring reliable packaging and safe delivery.
